attributes.action: Ban the use of CCTV cameras for issuing PCNs for parking contraventions.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Do we really need more automated surveillance cameras on our streets - this time issuing Penalty Charge Notices automatically? More ugly black poles marring our beautiful cities?
This time you wont even know you have received a £60 Parking Ticket until it arrives in the post.
Say No to Surveillance Britain.
